LanguageData.RottyMilden.label: Rotty Milden
LanguageData.RottyMilden.description:
Rotty Milden is a simple country girl who loves to tease and make mischief, but she means well.

Her antics ensure that life will never get boring, but sometimes she gets a little too excited and goes overboard with her conflicts.

Random-based small events occur more frequently and large events are less frequently.
